verses.name: Numbers 8:10
verses.text: And thou shalt bring the Levites before the Lord: and the children of Israel shall put their hands upon the Levites:

verses.name: Numbers 8:11
verses.text: And Aaron shall offer the Levites before the Lord for an offering of the children of Israel, that they may execute the service of the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 8:12
verses.text: And the Levites shall lay their hands upon the heads of the bullocks: and thou shalt offer the one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering, unto the Lord, to make an atonement for the Levites.
